desc: Young children are natural artists and innovators. Children’s Art Factory strives to provide opportunities for young children to explore the world around them by harnessing their innate curiosity with hands-on activities to challenge and inspire them. Visit us in Guelph, shop our art and sensory materials online!

layout.text: We are thrilled to be able to host parties once again! Thank you for choosing the Children's Art Factory to celebrate your special day!
